models

Class Code

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.db.ebean.Model
      • models.Code
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.avaje.ebean.bean.EntityBean, java.io.Serializable

    @Entity
public class Code
extends play.db.ebean.Model
    Codes are set on Statements to further characterize them. They are system-wide unique and support auto-completion. To manage the uniqueness a factory method is used.
    Author:
    Sven, Thiemo, Benedikt
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getCodeByName

        public static Code getCodeByName(java.lang.String name)
        Gives the Code instances to a specified name. Creates a new object if no such code exists.
        Parameters:
        name - - the name of the desired code
        Returns:
        the project wide unique Code.
